snippet: Bills advanced in both houses of the State Legislature that would let residents decide whether to expand casinos beyond Atlantic City.
abstract: Committees in both houses of New Jersey State Legislature offer bills that will put question of whether to allow two casinos to open in northern part of state on ballot in 2016; bills differ on some important details, such as amount of tax revenue generated by casinos that will be allocated to Atlantic City.
lead_paragraph: Bills advanced in both houses of the State Legislature that would let residents decide whether to expand casinos beyond Atlantic City.

headline.main: Voters Could Decide Next Year on Allowing Casinos in North Jersey
headline.print_headline: Voters May Decide on North Jersey Casinos in 2016
